thread.title: Pamela
thread.title_full: Mosaic Weighted Blankets reviewed by Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text:
I have nerve damage in my legs, I have tried water therapy, along with therapy, ( no relief ) I also have tried numerous medications, ( no relief )
I ordered a ten pound blanket, absolutely beautiful !!!! I have finally found relief from my pain, the weight is perfect for me, thank u Mosaic !!!!
I can finally sleep again
